name: FollowMeSticker.com
tag_list: social-media, personal-promotion, self-promotion, find-new-friends, social-media-stickers, username-stickers
overview:
FollowMeSticker.com lets you create Custom Social Media Stickers with your Username on them. We call these “Follow Me Stickersâ„ ”!

Individuals and Brands are increasingly aware of the importance of connecting with audiences on a more personal level through Social Media. Follow Me Stickersâ„  help promote your Facebook, Twitter, or YouTube accounts and provide better opportunities for connection with you and your community. We took it a step further and introduced QR codes to the mix using mini-stickers that can fit on anything from cellphones, envelopes, flyers and just about any promotional item you can think of. This is a powerful way of not only tracking the success of a promotion but increasing relevant and local followers through each promotion.

Each sticker is printed on a high quality gloss & weatherproof material so the placement choices are endless! Follow Me Stickersâ„  are highly visible, affordable, and an innovative way to connect and promote.
